short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin that can activate the function of counting earnings according to hours worked without the need to purchase a premium account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
History
-------------

v 1.0.0 (09.05.2021)

- currency: CZK, EUR, GBP, USD
- display earings in all report pages
- settings popup window after clicking on dollar sign (hour rate & currency)

v 1.0.1 (19.04.2022)

- quick fix, they changed the structure of the site and extension stopped working
